Knowledge Sharing with Pentalight Sdn. Bhd. on IoT Energy Efficient System
==========================================================================

by [attpic](https://fke.utm.my/author/attpic/ "Posts by attpic")
 | Jul 27, 2016 | [ATT](https://fke.utm.my/category/att/)

Represented by Dr Rozeha A. Rashid and Dr. Mohd Adib Sarijari, we had a meeting with the representatives from Pentalight Sdn Bhd on IoT energy Efficient system.

According to the report, Pentalight will shortlist twoÂ proposals from each department in FKE and will award one grant for Ph.D.

This is a good start for our collaboration with Pentalight, and Inshaa Allah more projects will come in the future.
